backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing WebRTC session offers, answers, and ICE candidate exchange using a map of session codes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing permission-related improvements and associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing their roles in the app.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, logs, and keystore files.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config defining SDK versions, build types, signing, dependencies, and Capacitor integration.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest declaring app permissions, features, main activity, FileProvider, and application metadata.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: Placeholder file for a native AdMob plugin with no implementation.
Placeholder file for rendering native ads with no implementation.
Main Capacitor BridgeActivity subclass initializing the Android app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Vector drawable defining the legacy FileDrop launcher foreground icon.
Empty placeholder for launcher icon foreground drawable.
Vector drawable defining the legacy FileDrop splash icon artwork.
Empty placeholder drawable for splash icon.
Layer-list drawable showing splash background and centered splash icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout defining CoordinatorLayout and main container frame for the app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon referencing background and foreground drawables.
Adaptive icon specifying background and foreground drawables.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Color resource definitions including splash and primary theme colors.
Resource defining launcher icon background color.
String resources defining app name and package identifiers.
App and launcher theme definitions including splash screen settings.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/xml/fi: FileProvider path configuration for cache, external, and internal file access.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config setting repositories, buildscript dependencies, and clean task.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Project-wide Gradle settings including JVM args, AndroidX flags, and ABI configuration.
frontend/android/keystore/README.md: Instructions for generating and storing the release signing keystore without committing it.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Gradle settings configuring repositories, project includes, and Capacitor modules.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration for app metadata, Android build options, server settings, and splash plugin.
frontend/docs/play-store/DATA_SAFETY_NOT: Explains FileDrop’s Google Play Data Safety answers, stating that no user data is collected and permissions are used only for QR scanning and file selection.
frontend/docs/play-store/LISTING_METADAT: Provides the prepared English Play Store listing text for FileDrop, including descriptions, features, tags, and release notes.
frontend/docs/play-store/PLAY_STORE_CHEC: A detailed checklist outlining steps for building, preparing assets, and submitting FileDrop to the Google Play Store.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AirShare web app, setting metadata, icons, manifest, and loading the main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining the AirShare app’s name, icons, colors, screenshots, and display settings.
frontend/public/privacy.html: Privacy policy stating that FileDrop collects no personal data and only uses temporary session and signaling metadata for peer-to-peer transfers.
frontend/README_ANDROID.md: Guide for building the Android app including prerequisites, setup steps, and Capacitor usage.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing session role, WebRTC state, and rendering the appropriate screen based on session state.
frontend/src/features/ads/components/Nat: Empty placeholder file for a native ad card component.
frontend/src/features/ads/nativeAdmob/na: Empty placeholder file for AdMob integration logic.
Empty placeholder file for an AdMob plugin wrapper.
frontend/src/features/ads/nativeAdmob/us: Empty placeholder file for a hook to load native ads.
frontend/src/features/session/components: Renders the app's header with logo and title.
UI for active WebRTC sessions handling file selection, incoming transfers, and progress display.
Displays an error message with optional retry and dismiss actions.
Landing page allowing users to choose sender or receiver mode with feature highlights.
Generates and displays a QR code for a session code using a canvas.
UI for receivers to join sessions via manual code entry or QR scanning and manage connection flow.
Sender-side UI for generating a session code, showing a QR code, and waiting for receiver connection.
Shows connection status, session code, and a disconnect button.
frontend/src/features/session/state/sess: Defines session state types and context shape for session flow.
frontend/src/features/session/utils/join: Generates, validates, and formats session codes and builds or parses simple QR payload strings.
frontend/src/features/session/utils/qrCo: Creates a simplified, non‑spec‑compliant QR code on a canvas using hashing and basic pattern placement.
frontend/src/features/session/utils/sess: Provides utilities to compute session expiry timestamps, check expiration, and format remaining time.
frontend/src/features/transfer/component: UI card component rendering rationale, denied, or checking states for Android file‑picker permissions.
File selection component integrating Android permission flow and listing selected files with removal and transfer actions.
Displays incoming file transfer details and lets the user accept or decline the transfer.
Shows file transfer progress, size metrics, and completion or cancel controls for sender or receiver roles.
frontend/src/features/transfer/hooks/use: React hook managing Android file‑picker permission state, checking, requesting, and settings redirection.
Manages WebRTC data channel file transfers, including metadata exchange, chunked sending, progress tracking, and handling incoming files.
frontend/src/features/transfer/utils/dow: Provides a helper to trigger browser downloads from a Blob using a temporary object URL.
frontend/src/features/transfer/utils/per: Supplies Android-specific permission text sets for storage/media access with fallback messaging.
frontend/src/features/webrtc/hooks/usePe: Sets up and manages an RTCPeerConnection, handles ICE candidates, and coordinates offer/answer and data channel creation based on role.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, identity loading, and context management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, noting that queries are defined in feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark mode color tokens and global UI tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Holds the current project schema, version, feature list, and architectural notes for an Android/React/WebRTC file‑transfer app. Captures existing capabilities, release considerations, and requirements for signaling, UI, and Android packaging.
